data.title: Corel Pinnacle Studio 25 Ultimate - Perpetual License - 1 User - Boxed Version - Image & Audio software - LDLC
data.meta_description: Buy Image & Audio software Corel Pinnacle Studio 25 Ultimate - Perpetual License - 1 User - Boxed Version (PNST25ULMLEU) on LDLC, high-tech expert. Video editing software (Multilingual, Windows).
data.text:
Professional-grade editing power

Take advantage of powerful tools you'd expect to find only in professional editing software, such as intelligent object tracking, blend modes, and audio features (noise reduction using a custom noise profile, tone scaling, and multi-channel sound mixing). Discover new features and enhancements such as 8K import, Keyframe Groups, Title Editor, as well as improved stability and software performance to give you an even better experience. Finally, take advantage of Corel Pinnacle Studio 25's great features such as

360° video editing (not available in Ultimate)

Video masking (not available in Ultimate)

Colour Calibration (not available in Ultimate)

Intelligent object tracking Video with dynamic screen splitting (not available in Ultimate)

Alpha channel (not included in Ultimate)

Screen recording

Video with dynamic screen splitting

Stop motion animation

Multicam editing

Blending modes

Video stabilisation

Key frame controls

Motion tracking

Title editing

Voice prioritisation

DVD authoring

Make your story cinematic

Why limit your creative vision by grounding it in reality? You choose the story you want to tell - whether it's a fantasy, documentary or love story - and Pinnacle Studio will help you achieve the incredible, professional results you're looking for with its many great features and precise controls.

With controls such as the tone curve, HSL adjustment, colour wheel and selective vectorscope, you can easily and individually adjust colour, highlights, midtones and shadows. Use special effects to add atmosphere and character to your productions. Use Pinnacle'sfilters to turn your movies into an old painting or sketch in a few clicks. Discover MultiCam, split screen video, screen recording and 360° video editor.

Finally, be sure to check out the "extra" options available on Standard, Plus and Ultimate such as Video Stabilization, Stop Motion Animation, Optical Corrections, 3D Title Editor, Green Screen, and Selective Color
